target_markets.market_description: Entrepreneurs building software products who want to create viral content and build audiences
pain_points: don't know how to create viral content
want to build audience but lack strategy
target_markets.market_size_indicators: mentions that people who understood early platforms (YouTube 2006-2012, Instagram 2012-2019, Twitter 2019-2023) created massive media empires

target_markets.market_description: People who want to own SaaS products that generate cash
pain_points: don't know how to build software products

problems_validated.problem: Entrepreneurs don't know how to create viral content with AI video tools
problems_validated.severity: high - described as needing an 'unfair advantage'
problems_validated.market_gap: lack of systematic approach to using AI tools like Sora 2 for viral content

products_tools.name: Sora 2
products_tools.use_case: AI video generation for creating viral content

products_tools.name: Claude
products_tools.use_case: Writing Sora prompts and content strategy

products_tools.name: Perplexity
products_tools.use_case: Research agent for audience insights and content frameworks

products_tools.name: ideabrowser.com
products_tools.use_case: Provides validated startup ideas and trends

business_strategies.strategy: Use viral content to build audience, then monetize that attention with startup ideas, consumer mobile apps, SaaS products, micro SaaS
business_strategies.implementation: Create viral videos using AI tools to own attention, then sell products to that audience
business_strategies.expected_results: Makes building startups easier, provides unfair advantage
business_strategies.case_study: People who understood early platforms created massive media empires

business_strategies.strategy: Distribution as the new moat - own attention to sell products
business_strategies.implementation: Build audience through viral content, then launch products to that audience

problems_solutions.problem: How to create viral AI videos that resonate with target audience
problems_solutions.solution: Use systematic workflow with Perplexity for research, Claude for prompt writing, and Sora 2 for video creation
steps: Use Perplexity as research agent to understand audience psychology
Copy research into Claude to generate video concepts
Use Claude to write Sora prompts

growth_tactics.tactic: Create scroll-stopping content using psychological triggers and proven frameworks
growth_tactics.results_expected: Higher likelihood of viral success, 1M+ views potential

steps: Use Perplexity deep research to understand target audience psychology
Prompt Claude to act as social media content strategist
Generate 10 video concepts using psychological triggers
Use Claude to write specific Sora 2 prompts
Iterate and refine prompts based on results
ai_workflows.use_case: Creating viral video content for audience building and startup promotion

metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Use psychological triggers and proven frameworks

trends_signals.trend: AI video generation for viral content creation
trends_signals.opportunity: Early adopters can gain unfair advantage in content creation and audience building
Owning attention becomes key competitive advantage for startups

actionable_quotes.context: Explaining why viral content creation matters for startups
actionable_quotes.actionability: Focus on building distribution channels before or alongside product development

actionable_quotes.quote: within 5 minutes, you'll be able to get 10 incredible concepts for whatever it is you're working on
actionable_quotes.context: Promise of the AI workflow efficiency
actionable_quotes.actionability: Use the described workflow to rapidly generate content concepts

key_statistics.context: Time efficiency of the described AI workflow

meta.title: How I'd use Sora 2 + Claude to hit 1M+ views on AI videos
